tracks.text: In black and white, debris sits in an alleyway. A figure wearing black gloves presses against the alley wall.
The figure, a man in a trench coat and sunglasses, walks carefully and looks around a corner
A cat walks behind a trash can. The figure puts out a cigarette.
A coin flips in the air
Black and white shoes walk along the sidewalk. The sidewalk panels light up as they are stepped on.
In color, Michael Jackson tosses a coin in the air.
Jackson notices a scruffy man in a coat lying behind a trash can.
He tosses a coin into a cup in front of the homeless man.
The cup glows, and a spotlight shines on the homeless man.
The man wakes up and looks down. He's wearing clean, white formal attire.
A city street corner. The man in the trench coat runs down the street. He drops a news paper with the headline "Billie Jean Scandal". He stops and retrieves the paper.
The man in the trench coat hides behind the corner. Michael Jackson walks down the sidewalk, lighting it up with each step, in time with the synthesizer.
A tiger cub runs out from behind the trash can.
Jackson pauses, and props his foot on the rim of a trash can. The can glows. He shines his shoes.
A white cat runs behind the trash can. A tiger cub emerges from the other side.
Jackson walks down the street, and leans against a street lamp. The man in the trench coat walks out from behind him.
A light flashes. A polaroid camera ejects a picture, showing the man in the trench coat alone by the street lamp. The man looks around.
Jackson stands on a path, the city in the background. He sings.
He dances and looks at us.
He puts on a coat and spins around. Next to him is a large billboard depicting 2 women and the word Louisa.
He gets closer to the billboard, and a new picture appears of the women looking at him. Another picture, where the women look at each other.
All back Jackson's eyes fade to black
The video splits into 3 stripes, with different stripes playing or being frozen. Jackson dances.
A bed is softly lit at night.
On the street, the trench coat man picks up tiger printed clothing.
Jackson sings to us.
A woman looks out her window into an alleyway at night.
Jackson walks by the window, and approaches a stairway
The woman reaches for a phone. Jackson puts a finger to his lips and walks up the stairs, past a sign reading Hotel.
The stairs glow as he steps on them.
The trench coat man climbs the stairs. The woman grabs her phone.
Jackson stands next to the bed, staring. The trench coat man appears through the window.
Jackson climbs into the bed. The trench coat man lifts a camera.
The bed glows.
The woman points to the stairs. Police officers run.
Police grab the trench coat man. He looks through the window, and Jackson is gone.
The police take the trench coat man away.
The trench coat man drops the tiger print on the sidewalk. A man in an all white suit walks by with a woman on his arm.
An adult tiger appears on the sidewalk, then runs away.
An occasional sidewalk panel glows, as if an invisible Jackson is walking away down the street.
